data.title: In Sympathy and Remembrance: John Scott
data.text: Trinity Wall Street, along with thousands around the world, is saddened by the death of John Scott, who has served since 2004 as Organist and Director of Music at St. Thomas Episcopal Church and Choir School in New York City. Scott had previously directed the choir at St. Paulâ€™s Cathedral in London from 1990 to 2004 and had conducted the St. Thomas Boys Choir at Trinity in 2012, as seen in this video.
